org.mini2Dx.ui.element

Class Modal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.ParentUiElement
        • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Column
          • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Container
            • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.Modal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hoverable, Navigatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsoluteModal, AlignedModal

    public abstract class Modal
extends Container
implements Navigatable
    A Container implementation that can be navigated by player input and supports hotkeys
